price: 43.Qhiyaamah ayro daalimiinih yan mari sinni magooqak sissikuk moyyaayi fayya haak, intiita keenik ittal magactaay sorkocobbaxitte keenik kasak foyyah anuk yawqen, digaalak aban meesih.
arabic: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: muh'ṭiʿīna muq'niʿī ruūsihim lā yartaddu ilayhim ṭarfuhum wa-afidatuhum hawāon
